Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

Python Module Index

c | p
 
c
catalog Catalog for storing metadata about sorted units.
cluster This module is intended for unsupervised clustering using a Gaussian Mixture Model (GMM).
 
p
plots A module for plotting various data of sorted units.
process This module is intended for processing raw electrical signals. For example, to detect and extract spikes or other threshold crossings from an electrophysiology recording.
